ThingDef.label: infused oil
ThingDef.description:
Infused oil is crafted by steeping rich oil with herbal medicine or aromatic spices inside an infuser, allowing their flavors and essences to meld over time. The result is a fragrant, golden liquid.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color>:

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 infused oil requires 10 oil plus 10 herbal medicine for a total of 200 value, and sells for 45, giving a <color=#33CC33>55.56%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 10 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>150</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, assuming corn to create the oil plus herbal medicine, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>1.07</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: truffle oil
ThingDef.description:
Oil infused with the essence of truffles, prized for its deep, earthy aroma and luxurious flavor. A few drops can elevate even the simplest dish into a decadent delicacy.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color>:

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 6 truffle oil requires 15 oil plus 50 raw fungus for a total of 205 value, and sells for 75, giving a <color=#33CC33>54.44%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 20 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>1250</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, assuming corn to create the oil plus nutrifungus, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>1.28</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: balsamic vinegar
ThingDef.description:
By slowly infusing vinegar with fruit sugars, the mixture develops into a rich, dark balsamic vinegar. The process deepens the flavor, thickens the texture, and turns a simple acid into a prized culinary ingredient.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 12 balsamic vinegar requires 15 vinegar and 50 fruits with an 1.2 average value, for a total of 150, and sells for 33, giving a <color=#33CC33>62.12%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 15 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>110</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Assuming rice and berries, average profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.93</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
